Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT C.Id, C.Price, C.Quantity, C.CustomerId, C.ProductId, P.Id, P.Name, P.Brand, P.Description, P.Specification, P.ImageURL, P.IsActive, P.Options, P.Price, P.Quantity, P.SubCategoryId from Cart C JOIN Product P on P.Id = C.ProductId WHERE C.ProductId in (SELECT ProductId from Cart where CustomerId = @CustomerId); END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Mobile, Email, Street, LandMark, City, State, Zipcode from Customer where Id = @Id; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Category WHERE Name LIKE '%'+@Name+'%') > 0) BEGIN SELECT P.Id, P.Name, P.Description, P.Specification, P.Options, P.Price, P.Brand, P.Quantity, P.ImageURL FROM Product P JOIN SubCategory SC ON P.SubCategoryId = SC.Id JOIN Category C on SC.CategoryId = C.Id WHERE C.Name LIKE '%'+@Name+'%'; END
ELSE IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SubCategory WHERE Name LIKE '%'+@Name+'%')>0) BEGIN SELECT P.Id, P.Name, P.Description, P.Specification, P.Options, P.Price, P.Brand, P.Quantity, P.ImageURL FROM Product P JOIN SubCategory SC ON P.SubCategoryId = SC.Id WHERE SC.Name LIKE '%'+@Name+'%'; END
ELSE IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Product WHERE Name LIKE '%'+@Name+'%')>0) BEGIN SELECT P.Id, P.Name, P.Description, P.Specification, P.Options, P.Price, P.Brand, P.Quantity, P.ImageURL FROM Product P WHERE Name LIKE '%'+@Name+'%'; END END

HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @SubCategoryId INT; set @SubCategoryId = (SELECT Id from SubCategory where Name = @SubCategoryName); UPDATE Product set SubCategoryId = @SubCategoryId, Name = @Name, Description = @Description, Specification = @Specification, Options = @Options, Price = @Price, Brand =@Brand, IsActive = @IsActive, Quantity=@Quantity, ImageURL= @ImageURL WHERE Id = @Id; SELECT Id from Product where Id = @Id; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE ShippingAddress set CustomerId = @CustomerId, Mobile = @Mobile, Street = @Street, LandMark = @LandMark, City = @City, State =@State, Zipcode = @Zipcode WHERE Id = @Id; select Id from ShippingAddress where Id = @Id; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
